errors.error_description: Specified Python 2.7 as minimum version requirement, which is outdated and incompatible with modern dependencies
correction_candidates: Before installing, make sure you have Python 3.8 or later installed on your system.
Before installing, make sure you have Python 3.6 or later installed on your system.
Before installing, make sure you have Python 3.7 or later installed on your system.
Before installing, make sure you have Python 3.9 or later installed on your system.
errors.golden_answer: Before installing, make sure you have Python 3.8 or later installed on your system.

errors.error_description: Referenced a non-existent configuration file path for Mapbox configuration
correction_candidates: You need to have an API key. First 50,000 geocode lookups are free every month. Configure the API key in your environment variables.
You need to have an API key. First 50,000 geocode lookups are free every month. The API key should be set in the application settings.
You need to have an API key. First 50,000 geocode lookups are free every month. Add the API key to your Docker environment file.
You need to have an API key. First 50,000 geocode lookups are free every month.
errors.golden_answer: You need to have an API key. First 50,000 geocode lookups are free every month.
